pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: ekspresi rendah hati untuk 行く dan 来る

lessons.japanese: １月１日は多くの日本人が神社にお参りする日です。
lessons.indonesian: January 1st is a day when many Japanese go to the shrine.
